references.paper_title: The role of dendrites in auditory coincidence detection
references.reason: This paper is foundational for understanding the role of dendrites in neural computation, providing insights into the biological mechanisms of dendritic integration that inspired this study's exploration of quadratic neurons.

references.paper_title: Submillisecond precision of the input-output transformation function mediated by fast sodium dendritic spikes in basal dendrites of cal pyramidal neurons
references.reason: This study provided crucial electrophysiological evidence for the high temporal precision of dendritic computations, underscoring the importance of considering dendritic properties in artificial neural networks.
Layer normalization is a crucial technique for stabilizing training in deep neural networks and is essential for ensuring the stable training of the proposed Dit-CNNs.

references.paper_title: Drawing inspiration from biological dendrites to empower artificial neural networks
references.reason: This review paper provides an overview of dendritic-inspired ANN models, positioning the current work within the broader context of incorporating biological neuronal properties into deep learning.

references.paper_title: Imagenet: A large-scale hierarchical image database
references.reason: ImageNet is the benchmark dataset used to evaluate the performance of Dit-CNNs, showcasing the model's competitive performance against state-of-the-art methods on a large-scale image classification task.
